articles.description: The MI skipper acknowledged that Hardik was a key member in their setup but the dynamics of the IPL auction and retention were such that they were not able to get him back
articles.content:
"Hardik was a very key member for us without a doubt. But again, the rules don't allow us to keep all the players." © BCCI
